availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Muir Allen (Jefferson County, Kentucky, physician and nurseryman)

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, physician and nurseryman. Kentucky native. Married to Frances L. Allen. Father of Wendell W. Allen, Estes Allen, William Allen, and Lillie Allen. Physician and nurseryman in Jeffersontown, Kentucky, in 1860.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Jefferson County, District 2, p. 30; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Jeffersontown, p. 28; Find A Grave, "William Muir Allen (1829-1919)," Memorial #92553080, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=92553080&ref=acom (accessed June 13, 2017); Commonwealth of Kentucky, Health Data Branch, Division of Epidemiology and Health Planning, Kentucky Death Index, 1911-present, Frankfort, KY, USA: Kentucky Department of Information Systems, Volume 43, Certificate# 21275, July 31, 1919 (accessed via ancestry.com).
